H0.text: The Moon must be full is a necessary condition for a lunar eclipse to occur.

H1.text: The Moon must be waxing is a necessary condition for a lunar eclipse to occur.

H2.text: It must be the beginning of the month is a necessary condition for a lunar eclipse to occur.

H3.text: It must be winter in the Northern Hemisphere is a necessary condition for a lunar eclipse to occur.

A4.text: lunar eclipses take place during a full moon
